Articles.Content:
**Mipa-21 e Mipa-22**

[http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1954](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1954)

[http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1957](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1957)

2 small jets to fly arround and have fun with the new aerodinamics.

![1qAvYhX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/1qAvYhX.jpg)

![IULLYNH.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/IULLYNH.jpg)

*obs: Do not go full throttle with Mipa-21... It's a bit dangerous...* ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Those are some nice looking planes ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Wish I had time to play right now, I'd give them a spin.
